alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 06 at 2:30AM MST until November 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Numerous showers and snow bands continue to develop and stream over the region this morning. Slick roads and reduced visibility can be expected until after sunrise this morning. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Idaho and west central Montana. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
